MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH2 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Queensferry Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:36am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing repair works on a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:38pm on the 20th of April 2021.
